name: Dr. Plutonium's Planetary Suuuuper Sizah!
description:
Description: "I am Dr. Plutonium, your creator. Boxbots, you must defend my planet!"

DPPSS is a co-op shoot em up in which players control 2 boxbots that have to coordinate together to cultivate their planet while defending it against incoming adversaries.

This short game was made in conjunction with Ludum Dare 38.

Creds:

1. Chua Yu Jia

2. Denice Heng

3. Aaron Lim

4. Ng E-Tjing

5. Jia Hao

6. Me
